Tag Team Hobbies - tagteamhobbies.com

TAG Team Hobbies, located in Colorado Springs is a dealer/distributor of fine airbrush products including Iwata and Grex. Our booth will feature Iwata airbrushes.

We also will have a hands-on airbrush experience right in the booth! Try an Iwata airbrush with all equipment and supplies provided by Iwata-Medea and TAG Team Hobbies. Seating for four on a first come first served basis. Complimentary to Symposium attendees.
